name: Men's UA Storm Armour Down Parka
description: This is our go-to down jacket for winter. It's crazy-warm, light, and still lets you move like an athlete.
UA Storm technology repels water without sacrificing breathability
600-fill Allied duck down insulation provides extreme warmth & is ethically sourced & traceable via tag
Lightweight woven fabric delivers superior comfort & durability
Generous, 3-piece hood with bungee adjust & extended, bonded brim
fitAndCare: Loose: Fuller cut for complete comfort.
Garment should be washed & dried fully zipped & turned inside out
Machine wash cold with like colors
Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed
